scripts.install:services: npm-run-all --parallel install:frontend install:collab-service install:matching-service install:question-service install:user-service install:history-service
scripts.dev: docker-compose -f docker-compose.dev.yml up --build -d && npm run frontend
scripts.restart: npm run stop && npm run dev
scripts.cleanup: docker-compose -f docker-compose.dev.yml down --remove-orphans -v && docker volume prune -f
